title: How to know what to write when you are writing music - Quora

response.answer_text: Tell us, How do you feel? I typically write about current situations and how I am feeling at the moment. People LOVE emotion. When you start writing lyrics, start with a feeling. So for instance, a song usually has a build to. Start gradually and build to an intensity. Write about a story? or even write about another person. There are so so so many reasons to write a song <3 hope this helps!

I don’t know…I just let the Muse guide me. Sometimes the unconscious mind provides all that that is needed for the creative spirit. It’s not me writing the song…it’s the spirit of the times working through me… I tend to prefer feeling over thinking when writing music but sometimes I think as well. Best, Spaceman da Destroya Feel free to ask me follow ups on my You tube Spaceman
